sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import {Box, Heading, SimpleGrid, Stack, Text, Link, Input, Button} from "@chakra-ui/react";
const Footer = () => {
    return (
      <Box minH={'40vh'} bg={'#2D3748'}>
          <SimpleGrid columns={4} spacing={10} p={4}>
              <Box minW="130px">
                  <Heading
                      as="h4"
                      color='gray.600'
                      fontSize="sm"
                      fontWeight="semibold"
                      textTransform="uppercase"
                      letterSpacing="wider"
                      mb={4}
                  >
                      Product
                  </Heading>
                  <Stack>
                      <Link>How it works</Link>
                      <Link>Pricing</Link>
                      <Link>Use Cases</Link>
                  </Stack>
              </Box>
              <Box minW="130px">
                  <Heading
                      as="h4"
                      color='gray.600'
                      fontSize="sm"
                      fontWeight="semibold"
                      textTransform="uppercase"
                      letterSpacing="wider"
                      mb={4}
                  >
                      Product
                  </Heading>
                  <Stack>
                      <Link>Privacy</Link>
                      <Link>Terms</Link>
                      <Link>License</Link>
                  </Stack>
              </Box>
              <Box minW='130px'>
                  <Stack spacing="4">
                      <Heading
                          as="h4"
                          color='gray.600'
                          fontSize="sm"
                          fontWeight="semibold"
                          textTransform="uppercase"
                          letterSpacing="wider"
                          mb={4}
                      >
                          Subscribe to our newsletter
                      </Heading>
                      <Text>Get notified when we add new components or we have exciting news for you.</Text>
                      <Stack spacing="4" direction={{ base: 'column', md: 'row' }}>
                          <Input
                              placeholder="Enter your email"
                              type="email"
                              required
                          />
                          <Button
                              type="submit"
                              colorScheme="blue"
                              flexShrink={0}
                              width={{ base: 'full', md: 'auto' }}
                          >
                              Subscribe
                          </Button>
                      </Stack>
                  </Stack>
              </Box>
          </SimpleGrid>
      </Box>
    );
};

export default Footer;
